MemoryInfobox.description: 'Timotheos wished to give his father a military burial in his Athens|Athenian armor. Alas, Diokles (Fisherman)|Diokles's armor stolen had been stolen from their home, so Timotheos tasked Kassandra with retrieving another set from a merchant.'
MemoryInfobox.type: The Lost Tales of Greece, Support

General_Description: '''Dressing up for Charon''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra spoke with [[Timotheos]] about recovering his [[Diokles (Fisherman)|father]]'s armor.
Section_Dialogue:
Using Ikaros to search the area.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Found him!''
She walked over to the merchant.

[[File:Dressing_up_for_Charon_Merchant.png|thumb|Kassandra speaking to the merchant]]

*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. ''Would you happen to have any Athenian armor in your shop? It's for Diokles's burial.''
*'''Timaios:''' ''Timotheos can buy his father's armor back if he likes. Won't be cheap though.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What do you mean?''
*'''Timaios:''' ''Diokles sold me his armor not too long ago.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Timotheos said his father's armor was stolen.''
*'''Timaios:''' ''Well, I have it here and I'm no thief. I also have another set of Athenian armor. Not as nice, but it'll do for the burial.''

<tabber>
|-|I'll buy Diokles's armor.[7500]=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take Diokles's armor.''
*'''Timaios:''' ''You'll find it in the chest upstairs. Pleasure doing business with you.''
Kassandra found [[Diokles' Armor]] on the roof of the merchant's house.

|-|I'll buy the cheaper armor.[250]=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take the cheaper armor.''
*'''Timaios:''' ''Figures a mercenary would choose the cheap armor. Here you go.''
Kassandra got a set of [[Standard Athenian Armor]].

|-|I'll buy both.[7750]=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take both sets of armor.''
*'''Timaios:''' ''Here's the Athenian armor. Diokles' armor is upstairs.''
Kassandra got a set of [[Standard Athenian Armor]] and found [[Diokles' Armor]] on the roof of the merchant's house.

|-|Attack - Hand over the armor, or else.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Diokles' armor should belong to his son. Hand it over.''
*'''Timaios:''' Laughs. ''You think you can threaten me? It's not like I store a set that valuable with my normal wares. You'll find it over my dead body.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's a chance I'm willing to take.''
Kassandra killed the merchant and found a set of [[Standard Athenian Armor]] on his body.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Standard Athenian armor. I could bring this back to Timotheos. Or I could look around for his father's armor.''
If she searched around she can also steal [[Diokles' Armor]] on the roof of the merchant's house.
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should be ready to meet Lykinos and Timotheos at the funeral.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra either recovered [[Diokles' Armor]] and/or a cheaper replacement.
Section_Trivia: * Alternatively players can just climb the roof of the merchant's house and steal the armor without talking to the merchant.
